input_args.passage: 'List of Anglo-Welsh wars | 614 Battle of Beandun – The West Saxons led by Cynegils defeat the West Britons, possibly led by Tewdwr ap Peredur, at Badbury Rings, Dorset. In what is ...'
input_args.claim: "We do not have a direct statement of Tewdwr ap Peredur's rank in this battle, but gives us additional information that a person named Rhys ap Tewdwr was a king of Deheubarth in Wales."
